attributes.action: provide free prescriptions for all those suffering from a long term illness which requires regular prescriptions
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: many people in the UK suffer from long term illnesses which require regular prescriptions. some people, such as epilepsy and some diabetes suffers already get free prescriptions, i think this should be extended to cover a much wider range of illnesses so you dont lose out for having the wrong condition.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
